title: FS/FT:  t206 cy young (bare hand) sgc 88!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  t206 cy young (bare hand) sgc 88!
posts.post_content: This card is incredible. Razor sharp corners and snow white borders. Looking either to sell it or trade for other high grade t206s. Please let me know what you might have available. Spotless piedmont 150 back like it was printed yesterday. A recent psa 9 sold for over $70k, smr price for a psa 8 is $13,500. Scans available monday morning, offered at $10,500.....thanks
